banner.title: Hello
banner.description: I'm Vinícius Albuquerque a Fronted Engineer based in Brazil

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hey, there! I'm Vinícius, a Frontend Software Engineer! I work with ReactJS, NextJS, and Typescript.



I started my career in the technology field early, right after I finished high school in 2017. I began working with computer maintenance, printers, and networking. While in that job, I started studying software development, initially with HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript, and soon I began working with React and React Native, which are my main working technologies. I also work with React Native for mobile development.



I am passionate about technology and turning ideas into real projects. I am always looking for a new challenge, believing that without difficulties, there is no learning. Nothing is impossible to develop; some things just take more time. An enthusiast of Go, NodeJS and Laravel, always learning new technologies.

description2.degree: Specialization in NextJS, ReactJS, React Native, Typescript
